question: Who among the following was the Sultan of Delhi reputed to have built the biggest network of canals in India?
explanation: Firoz Shah Tughlaq built and repaired a large numberÂ of canals. Sultan Firoz Shah Tughlaq was a Turkic Muslim ruler of the Tughlaq Dynasty, who reigned over the Sultanate of Delhi from 1351 to 1388. His father\'s name was Rajab who had the title Sipahsalar.
